description: Modify the HTTP service configuration. Multiple ips and ports can be configured.

ip.description: It is the IP where the HTTPS service is listening. The character * is used to listen in all configurated IPs. Enabled to set an array to configure multipe ips.

port.description: Port where HTTPS service is listening. Enabled to set an array to configure multiple ports

force.description: This option should be set to true to apply the action. It is required because the webserver will be restarted
